cause.description:
Comic Relief has an official fan page for RedNoseDay09 at www.facebook.com/rednoseday2009 and we would love you all to join us there for all the latest fun, news and videos.
For RedNoseDay 09 we are not using this 'causes' application for fund raising as we have our own fundraising pages available at www.rednoseday.com.
Sorry for any confusion and see you on our fan page very soon.
1. Visit the official website at www.rednoseday.com
2. Become a fan of the official Facebook group and spread the word on Facebook: www.facebook.com/rednoseday2009
cause.mission: PLEASE READ!! For RedNoseDay 09 we are not using this 'causes' application for fund raising as we have our own fundraising pages available at www.rednoseday.com
cause.name: Comic Relief - Red Nose Day 2009
